attributes.description:
5 Year / 150 000 Km Warranty & 5 Year / 60 000 Km Service Plan.1 Million Km Or 10 Year Engine Warranty!

Features: 
12.3 Inch Digital Instrumentation,  
Cruise Control (Adaptive), 
Electrically Adjustable Exterior Mirror (with memory), Keyless Entry and Push Button Start, 
Dynamic Cornering Signal, 
Privacy Glass, 
Rear view Camera (with dynamic guides), 
Rear Parking Sensors (Park Distance Control), 
Speed Sensitive Electric Power Steering, 
Tyre Pressure Monitoring System (TPMS), 
7 Seater, 
Electric Front Seats (with memory and 
Electric lumbar support on the driver seat.), 
8 Inch Touch Screen Ventilation Control, 
Sony Surround Sound System, 
Hill Assist & Downhill Assist, 
Wireless Charging Pad, 
Black leather Interior, 
Cooling Centre Console. 

The Tiggo 8 Pro has just landed and is packed with luxury, technology, and safety features. The Tiggo 8 Pro features Chery’s “Movement Design '' styling language which is a fluid design that disguises its size nicely while also maintaining a prominent presence. This Chinese midsize SUV provides seating for 7 occupants as a standard. It is powered by a 1.6 T-GDI engine that puts out maximum power of 145kW and maximum torque of 290Nm and is paired to a seven-speed dual-clutch automatic transmission. Adventure awaits you in the new Tiggo 8 Pro!

Nationwide delivery. 
T&C’s Apply.
E & OE

attributes.description:
Service Plan: 5 Year / 60 000km Road Side Assistance: 5 Years Unlimited Warranty: 5 Year / 150 000km Engine Warranty: 1 Million Km / 10 Years. 

Features:
Factory Fitted Immobiliser & Alarm, 
2 Front, 2 Front Side & 2 Curtain Airbags (6), 
Rear Doors (2) Mechanical Child Safety Locks, 
Second Row Isofix Seat Tethers, 
Central Locking, Rear PDCs, 
Rear View Reverse Camera, 
Speed Limit Reminder With Speed Setting Function, 
Tyre Pressure Monitoring System, 
Electronic Brakeforce Distribution, 
Brake Assist System, 
Electronic Stability Program, 
Hill Start Assist, 
Hill Decent Control, 
Blind Spot Detection, 
Door Open Warning, 
Rear Traffic Alert, 
Lane Departure Warning, 
Front Collision Warning, 
Automatic Emergency Braking, 
360 Degree All Round View Monitor, 
Door Ajar Warning, 
Keyless Entry (Remote Start / Stop), 
Remote Carlock & Window Close, 
Speed Sensitive Electric Power Steering, 
Driving Modes (Standard, Eco, Sports), 
Dynamic Adjustable Steering Modes (Eco, Sport), 
Cruise Control (Adaptive On Executive), 
Electrically Adjustable Exterior Mirrors With Integrated Indicators, 
Electrically Foldable & Heated Exterior Mirrors, 
Powered Panoramic Sunroof, 
Automatic Lighting (Activation), 
LED Headlights (With Levelling) And Tailights, 
LED Daytime Running Lights And Fog Lights (Front And Rear), LED Centre High Mounted Brake light. 
Factory Fitted Alarm, 
2 Front, 
2 Front Side & 2 Curtain Airbags (6), 
Rear Doors (2) Mechanical Child Safety Locks,

The Chery Tiggo 7 Pro is an appealing offer. This SUV has a muscular stance that is complemented by sculpted bodywork, so there’s no mistaking it for anything else. Equipped with an intelligent voice assistant, your Tiggo is ready to make your drive more pleasant by completing mundane tasks for you so your focus can stay on the road.

Nationwide delivery.
T&Cs
E & OE

attributes.description:
Carpointe- At Tavcor George we believe in first class customer service. 
All our Vehicles undergo a 80 Point Mechanical Check, AA Roadworthy Test and is Accident free unless advertised as otherwise. 
We do accept trade-ins of all Makes and Models. 
We have dedicated Finance Managers that can arrange finance for you should you want to finance the vehicle. We also offer Value Added Products like Service and Warranty Plan Extensions. 
We deliver Nationwide and charge a delivery fee depending on the distance of delivery. 
Price advertised excludes: Dealer Service Fee of R4000, Lic /Reg of R781, Number plates of R400.
